content:
SpeakOutputFormat Enum

Definition

Enumerates the types of speech output formats.

In this Article

public enum SpeakOutputFormat
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
System.Enum
SpeakOutputFormat

Fields

Text

Indicates text output.
WaveFormat

Indicates wave (audio) output.
